description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 31 July 2018 (RN 18/01096/FULL) which itself varied permission dated 12 May 2016 (RN: 16/02105/FULL) for the use of part basement, part ground, first, second, third, fourth and fifth floors for residential use (Class C3) to create nine residential units. Erection of a two storey rear extension at first and second floor levels with terraces above; installation of rear lightwells; removal of external staircase; installation of skylights and introduction of new and replacement plant NAMELY, to vary the approved drawing numbers to change the number of bedrooms provided in units 5 and 6 from 3 bed units to 2 bed units.
decision_conditions: Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
